profile.headline: AI-Driven Applications & ETL Expert (12+ years) — Agentic RAG • MCP • Data Platforms
profile.mission: Make complex data systems simple, reliable, and intelligent — so teams can ship faster with confidence.
philosophy: Pragmatic innovation: solve real problems with measurable impact.
Agentic systems: orchestrate LLMs and tools safely with observability.
Automation first: reduce toil, design for repeatability and scale.

bio.expertise: Designing AI-driven applications with agentic patterns (MCP) and RAG. Building microservices that enable LLMs to orchestrate tools safely, with comprehensive telemetry and guardrails.
bio.core_strengths: ETL architecture, hands-on automation, technical leadership, and transforming ambiguous requirements into robust, production-ready systems.
bio.current_exploration: LangGraph and AutoGen for multi-step planning, LoRA for local model fine-tuning, and enhanced observability patterns for agentic workflows.
bio.unique_approach: Focus on pragmatic solutions with measurable impact. Emphasis on observability, safety guardrails, and designing systems that teams can actually maintain and extend.

highlights: Led agentic platform initiative (Slack-first), integrating MCP microservices (Oracle MCP, Learning MCP) with Qdrant-backed RAG.
Supported and guided multiple data migration projects; defined standards, reviews, and performance hardening.
Introduced telemetry and routing observability using SQLite, improving triage speed and reliability.
End-to-end responsibility for production data pipelines: design, development, deployment, performance, and stability.
Built automation and tooling to accelerate migration workflows; drove cross-team integration and innovation.
Recruiting, mentoring, and code reviews; prioritized tasks and improved delivery predictability.

achievements.title: Amdocs Delivery — Cross-line Significant Contributor
achievements.impact: Developed TDM data injection engine and real-time transaction monitoring at scale; helped establish TDM as a production product generating over $3M in annual sales.

achievements.title: Amdocs Innovation Competition (Worldwide) — Top 5
achievements.impact: Smart Synthetic Data tool — ML-powered synthetic data generation with advanced controls and high fidelity.

education.note: Continuous learning through online courses (Udemy, Coursera) covering AI, data engineering, and application development.

projects.name: Learning MCP
projects.summary: FastAPI + Qdrant microservice that ingests large PDFs (e.g., API docs) and serves semantic search with API planning hints for downstream agents. Supports profile-based collections, concurrent embedding, and MCP protocol integration.
features: Background job management with SQLite tracking

projects.name: DS_Agent
projects.summary: Slack-first Text-to-SQL agent with database-aware routing, telemetry, and MCP integration. Uses vector search for context and guardrails to ensure safe query execution.

projects.name: Informatica Clean Data Tool
projects.summary: Retention-aware partition cleanup orchestrated by Informatica PowerCenter and Python engine. Features rule-based cleanup, dry-run mode, and notification system.

projects.name: Matrix Portfolio Webapp
projects.summary: Next.js + FastAPI SPA with Matrix-style UI, JWT auth, Slack-style chat, and admin telemetry. Showcases AI projects and demos with RAG-powered Q&A.

projects.name: Home Assistant — Advanced IoT Setup
projects.summary: Production-grade Home Assistant deployment with Docker. Advanced automations for security and daily routines. Frigate-based camera analytics with face/person/object detection and event-driven actions.

automations_examples: Face/person detection triggers lights and sends mobile notifications with snapshots (privacy-redacted).
Geo-fencing (arrival/departure) arms/disarms security scenes and adjusts climate/lighting.
Nighttime perimeter mode enhances camera sensitivity, silences non-critical alerts, records to separate retention bucket.
Package detection at door triggers TTS announcement and locks camera PTZ preset.
security_notes: Network segmentation with IoT VLAN and limited ingress.
Secret management via .env files (Vault integration planned).
Audit logs for all automation triggers.

media.notes: Vector database stores references only, not binaries. Store videos/images in object storage or Git repo; index captions/thumbnails and link here.
